item.title: Need help with the max hit's of magic and such!
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

The only things i have in case 131 is CalculateMage(); int hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);

should i remove them?

and for the magic should i use this?

int hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);[br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2007, 02:29:53 PM[/size][hr]Any suggestions?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2007, 02:40:52 PM[/size][hr] :o[br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2007, 03:05:19 PM[/size][hr]any suggestions?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2007, 03:30:53 PM[/size][hr]any help?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2007, 03:49:01 PM[/size][hr]

double MaxHit = 0; int mageHit = playerBonus[12]; MaxHit += (mageHit); playerMaxHit = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit);

item.title: Need help with the max hit's of magic and such!
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

[quote=“domServer, post:12, topic:128568”]ok i know wat u can do
see this?

if(spellID == 12881) // ice burst (lvl 70 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 70)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 10)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 10)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 15)==false))
{
sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
sendMessage("You need 10 "+getItemName(560)+", 10 "+getItemName(4278)+" and 15 "+getItemName(554));
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 10)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 10)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 15)==true))
{
startAnimation(1979);
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(19);
castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer();
castOnPlayer.entangle();
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
stillgfx(363, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.stillgfx(363, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!");
sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!");
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 10);
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 10);
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 15);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 70)
{
sendMessage("You need a magic level of 70 to cast this spell.");
}
}

after that change the 5 by the hitdiff to like 20 then it will be 20 = that random
so say the random was 10 then iot would be 30 instead of 15[/quote]

Thats nothing to do with what im on about idiot

ownage plz:

Did you take that other part out of your maging case ?

I replaced the void with the new one and didnt change the case itself apart from the spell[br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2007, 02:01:30 PM[/size][hr]What do you recommend?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with the max hit's of magic and such!
item.dc:creator: @domServer domServer
item.description:
@domServer wrote:

ok i know wat u can do
see this?

if(spellID == 12881) // ice burst (lvl 70 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 70)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 10)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 10)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 15)==false))
{
sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
sendMessage("You need 10 "+getItemName(560)+", 10 "+getItemName(4278)+" and 15 "+getItemName(554));
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 10)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 10)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 15)==true))
{
startAnimation(1979);
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(19);
castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer();
castOnPlayer.entangle();
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
stillgfx(363, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.stillgfx(363, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!");
sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!");
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 10);
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 10);
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 15);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 70)
{
sendMessage("You need a magic level of 70 to cast this spell.");
}
}

after that change the 5 by the hitdiff to like 20 then it will be 20 = that random
so say the random was 10 then iot would be 30 instead of 15

int MageBonus = playerBonus[12]; //Prayer(Magic) Bonus

i dont want it to rely on bonus… just max using the prayer thing, like id rename it spell dmg and each +1 = extra hit on using magic

so u can wear rune and hit[br][size=1]Posted on: July 30, 2007, 04:18:34 PM[/size][hr]Anyone? :s

also it still crashes when i put in it

hitDiff = 2 + misc.random(playerMaxHit);

just crashes when i cast it :s[br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2007, 05:16:12 AM[/size][hr]Anyone?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2007, 09:00:28 AM[/size][hr]So no-one can help?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2007, 01:14:20 PM[/size][hr]Ffs so many noobs spamming up the section i cant even keep this post on the first page!

help please? i just made the void just c&p’ed but i tryed to make it work but it failed hard lol

public void CalculateMage() { double MaxHit = 0; int RangeBonus = playerBonus[5]; //Range Bonus int Range = playerLevel[4]; //Range { MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(RangeBonus * Range) * 0.000575)); } MaxHit += (double)(Range * 0.1); //2 playerMaxHitRange = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit); }

item.title: Need help with the max hit's of magic and such!
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

well ive been trying to edit magic so that it works that the higher your prayer bonus the higher your hit (like dodians server). So i added some int’s to packet 131: which is magic on npc’s and these are the ints

double MaxHit = 0; int mageHit = playerBonus[12]; MaxHit += (mageHit); playerMaxHit = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit);
then this is the spell i edited.

if(magicID == 12939) // smoke rush { if(playerLevel[6] >= 50) { hitDiff = 2 + misc.random(playerMaxHit); inCombat(); //PkingDelay = 15; stillgfx(385, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); addSkillXP((200*playerLevel[6]), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 50) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 50 to cast this spell."); } whenever i cast it, it just disconnects me

anyone know how to fix?

Read full topic
